TITLE: Settings for the Audiotop Audio Streamer
SLEEPTIMERDOC: How much time (in seconds) to wait before entering to sleep mode, put 0 to disable sleep
METAURLDOC: scocketio url to get metadata info
AUTOSWITCHMETERONTITLELABEL: Auto Switch Meter on every title
AUTOSWITCHMETERONALBUMLABEL: Auto Switch Meter on every album
AUTOSWITCHMETERONRESTARTLABEL: Auto Switch Meter on every restart
RESTOREVOLDESC: Restore alsa setting back to volumio (for system update)
RESTOREAUDIOTOPDESC: Restore alsa setting back to audiotop
